name: World of Toyships
description:
My LudumDare Jam entry!

Its by no means finished but I ran out of time (mostly because of bad time management and some REALLY shitty bugs in Unity (yeah I talk to you point lights!))

There is a lot missing like a menu, or the ability to win / loose, but I invested so god damn much into this game, that I just had to publish it. It won't win but maybe I will redo the game and publish it on steam or something I dunno.

So the controls:

AD - Steering
WS - Acceleration (don't need to hold it, keeps the speed)
Mouse - Aiming
Left Click - Shoot
Escape - Close the game

Gameplay:

You have to kill the other teams... thats it... which is sad, because I wanted to add other gamemodes, but oh well, maybe next time.

Ways to die:

You die if you steer into a wall/enemy, or if the enemy shoots you
